summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of upgrade services, including FastTrack Upgrade, monthly payment plans, and trade-in programs. FastTrack Upgrade allows customers to get a new device in as little as 24 hours. Other upgrade options include monthly payment plans and trade-in programs for eligible devices in good condition. Customers should also check their coverage area before upgrading their device and consider protection plans for their devices in case of accidental damage or theft.
